featured.text: Also, the idea 30 a very complex issue regarding depression into something simple and easily understandable, and that tends to appeal to a lot of people. 26.
With hot stoves, boiling water and sharp knives at hand, it is understandable that parents don’t want children in the kitchen when they’re making dinner.

definition.zh_def: 易於理解的，清楚明白的。
definition.en_def: Able to be understood; clear and comprehensible.
definition.example: Her explanation was so understandable that everyone grasped the concept quickly.
